artist: Delineator: Giovanni Domenico Campiglia; Engraver: Silvestre Pomarede
description: bust length portrait of man facing right and looking out a viewer; wearing ruff; short hair, goatee and moustache
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: GIOVAMBATISTA  PAGGE \\  Pittore de Figure, nacque in Genova l\"anno 1554, mori l\'anno 1627 \\ Gio. Dom. Campiglia del.   Silv, Pomarede fc. | on sheet in pencil:  2-152
title: Portrait of Giovambatista Pagge
